params._amountIn: amount of ERC20 token to swap for weth
params._erc20Fee: pool fee for transfer ERC20/eth pool (3000 = 30bps)
params._minEthToGet: min amount of ETH to receive in the swap

params._crabAmount: amount of crab shares to withdraw
params._erc20Fee: pool fee for transfer ERC20/eth pool (3000 = 30bps)
params._maxEthToPay: max eth to pay in swap for wPowerPerp
params._minAmountOut: min amount of ERC20 to receive

flashDepositERC20(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: allows user to flash deposit into crab from an aribtrary ERC20

flashWithdrawERC20(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: allows user to flash withdraw from crab to an aribtrary ERC20
